alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 12 at 1:56PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following areas, Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Cave Creek, Deer Valley, Mesa, Globe, Miami, Rio Verde, San Carlos, Superior and Tonto Basin. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of normally dry washes, streets, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Unbridged crossings may be flooded * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior
